message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. It's a bit higher than I'm willing to pay.
I understand your budget concerns, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $160? It's a fair price considering the value this product offers.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit far off from that. I'm willing to pay $120, which I think is a more reasonable price for the product.
